alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:49AM CDT until June 29 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Mitchell County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Jewell County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Smith County in north central Kansas... Northern Osborne County in north central Kansas... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 549 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Alton, or 25 miles southeast of Phillipsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Osborne, Harlan, Portis, Downs and Cawker City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
